pages.text: chea tomleab nei kolosampnth kou r sh
tomleab robsa puokke ku kar thveudamnaer now rdauvornga r( daembi thveu chomnuonh now bratesa ye men) ning( now bratesa sha m) now rdauvokdaw
dau che neah chaur aoy puokke korp sakkar champoh mcheasa krobkrong kak hpeah nih choh
ku trong chea anak del ban phdal chamneiahar dl puokke daembi bambat nouv kar se r k khlean ning phdal sa ndi pheap dl puokke aoy chiesa phot pi karphyokhlach
tae anak( mou ham meat) bankheunh bokkol del bdeseth nung thngai chomnoumchomreah der ryyte
noh haey kuchea bokkol del baohbng kaunkamprea
haey min ch mrou nh knea aoy phdal chamneiahar dl anak kreikr
dau che neah pheap vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del sa la t
del puokke prongeuy k ndeu y champoh kar sa la t robsa puokke
puokke kuchea puok del sang ampeula daembi chng bangheanh aoy ke kheunh tebonnaoh
haey puokke min aoy tropy ke khchei laey saumbite b ndi ch b nduoch kadaoy
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban bratan aoy anak( mou ham meat) nouv a l ka v sae r( t ne l muoy nowknong thansuokr)
dau che neah chaur anak sa lat ning saamleh satv daembi mcheasa robsa anak choh
pitabrakd nasa anak del saabkhpaem anak( mou ham meat) ke nung trauv katphdach pi phl la( teang nowknong lokey ning barlok)
